newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Subdued economy hits C-C Amatil profit.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Subdued economy hits C-C Amatil profit.

text.p: Soft drinks and snack food group Coca-Cola Amatil Ltd said on Friday its profitability in Australia in 1996 was hit by a subdued and competitive retail environment in the second half and by expenses associated with rationalisation of production and warehousing facilities.
C-C Amatil earlier reported its 1996 net profit rose to A$142.1 million from A$138.6 million in 1995.

Australian sales revenue grew seven percent to A$1.3 billion and market share growth in both foodstores and cold drink channels was also buoyant with new records set, it said in its review of the year.
